selection_reasoning: Small but real improvement: 2.6280 -> 2.6285 (gap: 0.0075). Iterated local search helped! Success rate improved to 11/16 (69%). Next gen should focus heavily on refining trial_2_1 with more local search iterations and finer perturbations. Two timeouts suggest some approaches are too slow.

trial_selections.reasoning: NEW BEST at 2.6285! Iterated local search on trial_1_6 improved slightly. Only 0.0075 from optimal.
Strong baseline at 2.6280. Still competitive, proven reliable.
Long optimization run at 2.6273. Multi-start with diverse inits - good for further exploration.
CMA-ES with SLSQP polish at 2.6104. Different optimization paradigm worth improving.
